Name: Artemis
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with Artemis’ Bow and Artemis’ Dagger.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend Characteristic of 0.

In the Tactics Step, this model may select an enemy Formation within 18" to be the target of the Hunt. Until the send of the turn, whenever a friendly Formation makes attacks against the selected target, that friendly Formation may re-roll failed hit rolls.

Spells.Name: Thrill of the Hunt (30)
Spells.Effect: Select an enemy Formation within 12" of this model, until the end of the round, whenever a friendly Formation makes attacks against the selected unit, that friendly Formation may re-roll failed wound rolls of 1 and improve the Rend Characteristic of weapons they are equipped with by 1 until the end of the round.
